content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_projectDB;
 

select * from 
    OPENROWSET(
        bulk 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'parquet'
    )as result_set


    ************************************************************************************************************

select * from 
    OPENROWSET(
        bulk 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'parquet'
    )as result_set


    ************************************************************************************************************


select result_set.filename() as source_filename,
result_set.filepath() as source_filepath,
result_set.filepath(1) as year,
result_set.filepath(2) as month,
 result_set.* from 
    OPENROWSET(
        bulk 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'parquet'
    )with (
    store_and_fwd_flag char(1) ,
    VendorID int,
    lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
    lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT
        ) 
as result_set
